```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
drugspending<-read.csv("Medicare Part B Drug Spending YTD 2017.csv", skip = 3) %>%
clean_names() %>%
  select("drug_description", "brand_name", "generic_name","x2013_total_spending", "x2013_total_dosage_units",
         ,"x2014_total_spending", "x2014_total_dosage_units", ,"x2015_total_spending", "x2015_total_dosage_units", ,"x2016_total_spending", "x2016_total_dosage_units", ,"x2017_total_spending", "x2017_total_dosage_units",
         "change_in_average_spending_per_dosage_unit_2016_2017", "annual_growth_rate_in_average_spending_per_dosage_unit_2013_2017")
```
